title: Analysis of g based on analytical info for g' and g'' part - c

content.description: The function g is defined for x>0 with g(1)=2, g'(x)= sin(x+1/x ) , and g''(x)=(1-1/x2 )cos(x+1/x ).
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of g at x=0.3.
